entry.title: Attention
entry.summary:
Author: LicoricexWitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,011Chapters: 3/3Kudos: 85

Summary: You've always been obsessed with superheroes, ever since you were a little kid. You moved to Gotham all alone with stars in your eyes for undergrad before the cold reality of city-living set in. The streets were mean and people weren't as kind as they were back home. It was hard to make friends and you preferred to stay inside, making you even lonelier. You were a regular fish out of water, not a lot of close friends or family, living all alone--the perfect target for someone with not-so-nice intentions. They always said not to meet your heroes because they could never live up to your expectations. Or sometimes, they weren't a hero at all.

entry.title: Follow The Leader
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,169Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 66

Summary: You were no hero nor vigilante, but you played your own role, assisting those who lived on the streets just like yourself. You would occasionally take on a dirty job of some description, whether that was a drug run, a stint in a brothel, whatever it took to get your hands on money. Then, you‚Äôd take your cut, disappear a while, and go around Gotham offering food, water, warm blankets, and other necessities to those who needed them. Children, adults, dirty, clean, old, young, didn‚Äôt matter to you. If they needed help, they got it. When some thugs come for revenge for a drug run gone wrong, you are saved by the Red Hood. But, as you are a criminal yourself, you are terrified of what he might do to you. He wants to show you he has no intention to hurt you.

entry.summary:
Author: River_Shayde

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,787Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Ever wonder what would happen if Dick had to raise Jason, Tim, and Damian during the 1960s in Gotham? What if they all met a once privileged girl who lost everything and now has to acclimate life in the greaser side of town? How will they all interact and face the villains, socs, and family issues that make up their daily life?Reader turns 18 a few days after meeting the family, and this will mainly be a Jason and Tim love story.
